name: The Rogue Cavern
description:
Enter a procedurally generated cavern and get as far as you can. Travel through increasingly difficult floors and find items.

FEATURING:

A procedurally generated level system- no two games are the same!

Over 25 unique items to discover and use. Including:
Remote control boxing-glove-in-the-boxes
Reverse rocks that send you flying backwards when thrown
A staff that creates gusts of wind to blow things around
Shoes that enable wall jumping

Geodes- Find them in the cave and send them back up to the surface. Stop by the geode breakers to find out what's inside!

Cards- Equip them to change the way you play the game. Over 50 to collect!

Bosses- find the key in the level and bring it to the door. What lurks on the other side?
